brand.name: StarQuest
brand.slogan: Complete quests. Earn stars. Unlock rewards.

verification.checkEmailMessage: We've sent a verification link to:
verification.instructions: Click the link in the email to verify your account and complete registration.
verification.checkSpam: Check your spam folder or request a new email.
verification.confirmedMessage: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in to your account.
verification.invalidToken: This verification link is invalid or has expired.

history.title: Star History
history.emptyState: No transactions yet. Start completing quests to earn stars!

quests.title: Quests
quests.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete '{name}'? This action cannot be undone.
quests.noQuestsYet: No quest templates yet. Add your first quest to get started!

admin.title: Parent Dashboard
admin.noChildrenInFamily: No children in family yet. Add a child first.
admin.autoApproveInfo: This redemption will be approved immediately.

family.title: Family Management
family.subtitle: Family
family.noChildren: No children yet. Add your first child to get started!
family.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.
family.emailOptionalHint: Email is optional. If not provided, a temporary email will be used.
family.passwordHint: Minimum 6 characters. Click Generate for a memorable password.
family.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
family.savePassword: Please write down this password. You'll need it for the child to log in.
family.resetPasswordWarning: The child's current password will be replaced. Make sure to save the new password.
family.writeDownPassword: Please write down or save this password. The child will need it to log in.

credit.pageDescription: Manage credit limits and interest rates for your children's star accounts.
credit.noChildren: No children in your family yet.
credit.enableCreditDescription: Allow this child to borrow stars when their balance is insufficient.
credit.creditLimitDescription: Maximum amount of stars this child can borrow.
credit.limitBelowDebtWarning: Warning: Credit limit is below current debt amount.
credit.disableWithDebtWarning: Credit will be disabled, but the existing debt will remain until repaid.
credit.interestInfo: Interest will be charged monthly on outstanding debt based on your family's interest tiers.
credit.interestTiersDescription: Configure tiered interest rates based on debt amount.
credit.confirmDeleteTier: Are you sure you want to delete this interest tier?
credit.tiersTip: Higher debt amounts can have higher interest rates to encourage timely repayment.
credit.noSettlementsYet: No settlements have been processed yet.
credit.settlementsInfo: Settlements are processed automatically on the 1st of each month.
credit.noInterestCharged: No interest charged - balance was not negative.
credit.settlementScheduleInfo: Settlements run automatically on the 1st of each month at midnight UTC. Interest is calculated and credit limits are adjusted based on repayment behavior.
credit.settlementDayLabel: Choose which day of the month to process settlements:
credit.settlementDayNote: Choose 'Last day' to always settle on the last day, or pick a specific day (1-28).
credit.settlementDaySaveError: Failed to save settlement day setting
credit.autoRepaymentInfo: When children earn stars, any debt is automatically repaid first before adding to their balance.
credit.debtRepaymentInfo: Tip: When you earn stars, they will automatically be used to pay off your debt first.
credit.borrowingWarningMessage: You will borrow {amount} stars to complete this redemption.
credit.interestWarning: Interest will be charged on your debt at the end of each month.
credit.highUsageWarning: You're using most of your credit limit!
credit.cannotAfford: You don't have enough stars for this reward.
credit.redemptionPendingInfo: Your request will be sent to your parents. Stars will be deducted after approval.
